EmailTemplate.description: For use in delivering auto notifications about opportunities approaching close date
EmailTemplate.name: Opportunity Close Date
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} is about to close!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName},
Your opportunity for {!Opportunity.Account} for a total amount of {!Opportunity.ExpectedRevenue} is set to close on {!Opportunity.CloseDate} and the stage is not yet closed.
Please extend the close date or change the stage of the opportunity.
To get to your opportunity quickly, please use this link. {!Opportunity.Link}
Thank you
